Iptc.Name: Record Version
Iptc.Description: Identifies the version of the Information Interchange Model

Iptc.Name: Object Name
Iptc.Description: Used as a shorthand reference for the object

Iptc.Name: Urgency
Iptc.Description: Specifies the editorial urgency of content and not necessarily the envelope handling priority

Iptc.Name: Keywords
Iptc.Description: Indicates specific information retrieval words

Iptc.Name: Created Date
Iptc.Description: Indicates the date the intellectual content of the object was created rather than the date of the creation of the physical representation

Iptc.Name: Created Time
Iptc.Description: Indicates the time the intellectual content of the object was created rather than the date of the creation of the physical representation

Iptc.Name: By-line
Iptc.Description: Contains name of the creator, e.g. writer, photographer or graphic artist

Iptc.Name: By-line Title
Iptc.Description: Title of the creator or creators. Where used, a By-line Title should follow the By-line it modifies

Iptc.Name: City
Iptc.Description: Identifies city of origin from which the object originates, according to guidelines established by the provider

Iptc.Name: Sub-location
Iptc.Description: Identifies the location within a city from which the object originates, according to guidelines established by the provider

Iptc.Name: Province/State
Iptc.Description: Identifies Province/State of origin from which the object originates

Iptc.Name: Country/Primary Location Code
Iptc.Description: Indicates the ISO 3166 code of the country/primary location where the intellectual property of the object was created

Iptc.Name: Country/Primary Location Name
Iptc.Description: Provides full, publishable, name of the country/primary location where the intellectual property of the object was created, according to guidelines of the provider

Iptc.Name: Headline
Iptc.Description: Publishable entry providing a synopsis of the contents of the object

Iptc.StringValue: Copyright Notice = Copyright Dan Petitt and CodeRanger.com. All rights reserved.
Iptc.Name: Copyright Notice
Iptc.Description: Contains any necessary copyright notice

Iptc.StringValue: Caption = View of Bath's Royal Crescent from the lower lawn showing the 'ha-ha'
Iptc.Name: Caption
Iptc.Description: Textual description of the object, particularly used where the object is not text

Iptc.Name: By-line
Iptc.Description: Contains name of the creator, e.g. writer, photographer or graphic artist

Iptc.Name: Copyright Notice
Iptc.Description: Contains any necessary copyright notice

Iptc.Name: Country/Primary Location Name
Iptc.Description: Provides full, publishable, name of the country/primary location where the intellectual property of the object was created, according to guidelines of the provider

Exif.Name: Resolution Unit
Exif.Description: Unit for measuring Horizontal and Vertical resolutions

Exif.Name: Software
Exif.Description: Records the name and version of the software or firmware of the camera or image input device used to generate the image

Exif.Name: Date Time
Exif.Description: Date and time of image creation or when last modified

Exif.Name: Photo Exif Version
Exif.Description: Records version of this standard which is supported

Exif.Name: Photo Components Configuration
Exif.Description: Records information specific to compressed data

Exif.Name: Photo Flashpix Version
Exif.Description: FlashPix format version supported by a FPXR file

Exif.Name: Photo Pixel X Dimension
Exif.Description: Records the valid width of the meaningful image when it has been compressed

Exif.Name: Photo Pixel Y Dimension
Exif.Description: Records the valid height of the meaningful image when it has been compressed

Interoperability.Name: Interoperability Index
Interoperability.Description: Indicates the identification of the Interoperability rule; 'R98' denotes ExifR98 Rules

Iptc.Name: Caption
Iptc.Description: Textual description of the object, particularly used where the object is not text

Iptc.Name: Writer/Editor
Iptc.Description: Identification of the name of the person involved in the writing, editing or correcting the object or caption/abstract

Iptc.Name: Headline
Iptc.Description: Publishable entry providing a synopsis of the contents of the object

Iptc.Name: Special Instructions
Iptc.Description: Other editorial instructions concerning the use of the object, such as embargoes and warnings

Iptc.Name: By-line
Iptc.Description: Contains name of the creator, e.g. writer, photographer or graphic artist

Iptc.Name: By-line Title
Iptc.Description: Title of the creator or creators. Where used, a By-line Title should follow the By-line it modifies

Iptc.Name: Credit
Iptc.Description: Identifies the provider of the object, not necessarily the owner/creator

Iptc.Name: Source
Iptc.Description: Identifies the original owner of the intellectual content of the object. This could be an agency, a member of an agency or an individual

Iptc.Name: Object Name
Iptc.Description: Used as a shorthand reference for the object

Iptc.Name: Created Date
Iptc.Description: Indicates the date the intellectual content of the object was created rather than the date of the creation of the physical representation

Iptc.Name: City
Iptc.Description: Identifies city of origin from which the object originates, according to guidelines established by the provider

Iptc.Name: Sub-location
Iptc.Description: Identifies the location within a city from which the object originates, according to guidelines established by the provider

Iptc.Name: Province/State
Iptc.Description: Identifies Province/State of origin from which the object originates

Iptc.Name: Country/Primary Location Name
Iptc.Description: Provides full, publishable, name of the country/primary location where the intellectual property of the object was created, according to guidelines of the provider

Iptc.Name: Category
Iptc.Description: Identifies the subject of the object in the opinion of the provider

Iptc.Name: Urgency
Iptc.Description: Specifies the editorial urgency of content and not necessarily the envelope handling priority

Iptc.Name: Keywords
Iptc.Description: Indicates specific information retrieval words

Iptc.Name: Copyright Notice
Iptc.Description: Contains any necessary copyright notice
